string-array.name: recommendations
string-array.item: Do not do exercises through pain!
If you are tired, take a break.
Clothing during exercise should be light, not restricting movement.

resources.string: The medical rehabilitation application is designed for patients after anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction. The complex of exercises of therapeutic gymnastics is designed to be performed at home.
Exercise 1: Starting position - standing. Roll the ball over the entire surface of the foot. Perform 5 minutes.
Please fill out the questionnaire and send it to your attending physician, so it will be easier for him to monitor the state of your medical rehabilitation
Was it painful when doing the exercises?
Specify the numbers of exercises that cause difficulties/unpleasant sensations (If there are none, leave the field empty)
Exercise 2: Starting position – lying on your stomach, hand on the lower back (for control). The operated leg is lifted up by 10-15 cm . and we perform dynamic exercises. Perform 8-10 times.
There are contraindications. Before using this application, it is necessary to consult with your doctor
Select the date of the next class

Exercise 3: Starting position - lying on your back. We start with a healthy leg. Raise the straight leg by 10 degrees, 20 degrees and 30 degrees, holding at each level for 7-10 seconds, slowly return to the starting position. Perform alternately with each leg 10-15 times.
Exercise 4: Starting position - lying on the side of the operated leg, the upper leg is bent at the knee, resting in front of the other leg. Perform lifting of the operated leg. Perform 10-15 times.
For this exercise, use a small ball (tennis).
It is advisable to perform this exercise on a gym mat.
The appearance of pain during exercise is a signal to reduce the amplitude of exercise, their intensity, or to completely stop their performance.
To return to the main menu, press the \"Back\" button again
To exit the app, press the \"Back\" button again.
